title: Random Lag when going into a game?
body:
I've been having this problem ever since i downloaded the league client, but I always brushed it off since it was no big deal...
But now im kind of annoyed since i have to stop talking to my friends while the game loads. Like after champion select, and it loads, it goes into fullscreen, and as its going into fullscreen, my computer just freaks out, like audio from discord gets all distorted, videos on my second monitor get really laggy, and it goes away just a few seconds when all the banners show up and it shows all the champions and the percentage they've loaded in. Again.. its only for a few seconds, but it's pretty annoying

I have pretty decent specs as well 

AMD R9 380 series - Graphics Card
AMD FX(tm)-8320 Eight-Core Processor
16 gigs of ram

Also running on windows 10 64 bit edition

replies.body: If it's only happening when League is on the loading screen, your pc might be having a hard time loading all of the game assets while discord and such is running in the background. I would try turning off some of the background programs (doesn't have to be discord, but some programs you don't really need may need to be turned off). If nothing else, I'd suggest trying a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7).
